name: Tourily
author: Tourily, Inc.

sections.description:
Tourily plugin creates custom property listings and real estate virtual tours. This plugin works with a free Tourily.com account in order to provide you with search engine optimized virtual tours on tour own website.

Features in V1.0:

  • Search engine optimized virtual tours.
  • Property listing detail page.
  • Widgets to display listings in widget ready areas.
  • Shortcodes to embed property listings within pages or posts.

To use this plugin you need an active username and password at Tourily.com.
sections.installation:
Upload the plugin and activate. In settings enter your Tourily username and passwords. Done.

Listings created on Tourily.com will display on your WordPress site.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Bug fixes for image ordering in tours.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Tourily Plugin allows you to display property listings and virtual tours. Note must have an active account at Tourily.com to connect to.
